response.overview: Three filmmakers—Santosa, Bayu, and Budi—were arrested by the police for rigging an online lottery to finance their film. During interrogation, they recounted their struggle to secure grant funding. Using an AI application developed by their friends at Anarko, Santosa and his crew, who failed to obtain a grant from the ministry, resorted to manipulating an online lottery to get the production money and submit their film to a festival. After completing the shoot, they were arrested by the police and sentenced. Two months later, thanks to the efforts of their editor, Asep, who wasn't arrested, their film won a festival award.
response.title: Pemburu Hibah
